title: How to Block Someone From Tracking Your Smartphone | Synonym
description: On a BlackBerry device, enter the "Options" menu and select "Advanced Options," then click "GPS" and disable "Location Aiding." Windows Phone users launch the Settings app, select "Location" and then disable "Location Services." Note that apps requiring location services -- like weather tickers or shopping apps -- may not function properly.

title: How to stop someone from tracking or spying on your cell phone -
description: 20-10-2019 The carrier can locate a phone using tower triangulation. The only way to stop this is to turn the phone off - permanently. When the phone is on, even for a few seconds, the carrier data systems will know where the phone is instantly. So, if you are on the run from the police, dont take your phone - it will give you away.

title: How to Tell If Your Cell Phone Is Being Tracked Tapped or
description: 05-03-2020 If you hear a voice telling you either 1 or 2, then it means your phone has not been infected by tracking software. If, however, you hear 3 or 4, then this means some is trying to, or already has, broken into your device. Try to reset the program of your device, although theres no guarantee if the reset will remove the spyware.

title: How to tell if your cell phone is tracked, tapped or monitored by
description: 27-05-2015 Is your phone making noises or lighting up its screen when youre not using it? Call and message alerts to one side your phone should be as silent as a sleeping baby when not in use. Does it also reboot for no reason at all?
